mapper.select: SELECT fs.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM favorite f WHERE f.favorites_id = fs.favorites_id) as number FROM favorites fs WHERE fs.user_id = #{userId} order by fs.create_time DESC

SELECT r.image_url FROM favorites fs LEFT JOIN favorite f ON fs.favorites_id = f.favorites_id LEFT JOIN recipe r ON r.recipe_id = f.recipe_id WHERE fs.favorites_id = #{favoritesId} ORDER BY f.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
